raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual exhibits a strong preference for feel-good films, consistently giving high ratings to movies that evoke positive emotions and showcase strong performances by actors. Their review pattern reveals a notable enjoyment of family-centric narratives and films featuring notable actresses. Despite some lower ratings reflecting dissatisfaction, these instances are outnumbered by enthusiastic responses to enjoyable content. 

An inclination towards storytelling that is both light-hearted and emotionally uplifting is apparent, as evidenced by their recurring mentions of humor, excellent acting, and satisfying resolutions. In terms of quality, they seem to prefer well-produced films featuring popular stars, often highlighting the film's cinematography and overall aesthetic appeal. 

The user also displays varied price sensitivity, as they give high ratings to movies irrespective of whether they represent a premium pricing tier or a budget selection. However, disappointments seem to stem more from the quality and engagement level of the film rather than cost. Overall, the user gravitates towards accessible, heartwarming stories that prioritize emotional resonance and strong character portrayals.

target_interaction.title: Wasted my time with this one! 😒
target_interaction.text:
Shallow mindless fluff! Typical Hollywood movie! No redeeming features!!!
Except, Clooney has nice teeth!
